Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Torca/Sideswipe:::

::Torca hears Klant::
Torca: In normal ircumstances, i would disagree, but I find that i agree with 
you.  What are we going to do about it?
::Torca dodges the ionic displacer beams.  When Klant is hit he hesitates, 
then gets enraged::
Torca: Hey, you attack me, fine, but when you do that to my pal, you pay!
::he switched his dorsal gun to automatic nail gun.  he fires 25 nails  at 
Astroblast::
~~~~~
::He dodged some of the shots, but got hit with a lot of them.  He took out 
his automatic rifle and fired 25 shots at Nightstrike::

--part1_3f.152eb41d.28333855_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
